headline: How Analyst Views on Honeywell Are Evolving After the Solstice Spin-Off and Value Reassessment
summary: Honeywell International’s stock narrative is shifting after analysts revised the company’s fair value estimate downward from $252.97 to $248.54, following the spin-off of Solstice Advanced Materials. The updated revenue growth projection, which reflects the removal of Solstice from consolidated estimates, suggests a more tempered outlook in the short term. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep pace with these evolving forecasts and Honeywell’s ongoing transformation. What Wall Street...
